languages.text:
Cargo is for storing loot that is not valuable enough for a mighty Rogue Trader.
Drag pieces of loot to remove it from your loot screen. It will be packed into a suitable cargo space. You may withdraw loot from cargo at any time.
Selling full cargo to merchants improves your {g|Encyclopedia:Reputation}reputation{/g} with their faction. However, all loot inside that cargo will be lost.
languages.original_text:
Из трофеев, которые не представляют особой ценности для могущественного Вольного Торговца, формируются грузы.
Вы можете перетаскивать отдельные элементы с экрана трофеев — они будут добавлены к соответствующим грузам. Трофеи можно извлечь из грузов в любой момент.
Сформированные грузы можно продавать торговым представителям, чтобы улучшать {g|Encyclopedia:Reputation}репутацию{/g} с их фракциями. Но в этом случае вы потеряете все трофеи в составе груза.

traits.locale_text:
Cargos are all the trophies that are not good enough for a mighty Rogue Trader.
Drag a trophy to remove it from your trophy screen. It will be packed into the suitable cargo. You may withdraw any trophies from the cargo list at any time.
Selling full cargo to merchants improves reputation with their faction. Yet all trophies inside the cargo will be lost.

Cargo is for storing loot that is not valuable enough for a mighty Rogue Trader.
Drag pieces of loot to remove it from your loot screen. It will be packed into a suitable cargo space. You may withdraw loot from cargo at any time.
Selling full cargo to merchants improves your reputation with their faction. However, all loot inside that cargo will be lost.

Cargo is for storing loot that is not valuable enough for a mighty Rogue Trader.
Drag pieces of loot to remove it from your loot screen. It will be packed into a suitable cargo space. You may withdraw loot from cargo at any time.
Selling full cargo to merchants improves your {g|Encyclopedia:Reputation}reputation{/g} with their faction. However, all loot inside that cargo will be lost.

Cargo is for storing loot that is not valuable enough for a mighty Rogue Trader.
Drag pieces of loot to remove it from your loot screen. It will be packed into a suitable cargo space. You may withdraw loot from cargo at any time.
Selling full cargo to merchants improves your {g|Encyclopedia:Reputation}reputation{/g} with their faction. However, all loot inside that cargo will be lost.

languages.text:
货舱用来储存对行商浪人而言不够吸引人的战利品。
您可以拖拽战利品，将其拖入货舱界面。被拖走的战利品会被装入合适的货舱中。您可以随时从货舱中取出物品。
将货舱装满之后，可以将满载的货物出售给商人，提高您在该阵营中的{g|Encyclopedia:Reputation}声望{/g}。不过，货舱中所有出售的货物都会永远消失。
languages.original_text:
Cargo is for storing loot that is not valuable enough for a mighty Rogue Trader.
Drag pieces of loot to remove it from your loot screen. It will be packed into a suitable cargo space. You may withdraw loot from cargo at any time.
Selling full cargo to merchants improves your {g|Encyclopedia:Reputation}reputation{/g} with their faction. However, all loot inside that cargo will be lost.

货舱用来储存对行商浪人而言不够吸引人的战利品。
您可以拖拽战利品，将其拖入货舱界面。被拖走的战利品会被装入合适的货舱中。您可以随时从货舱中取出物品。
将货舱装满之后，可以将满载的货物出售给商人，提高您在该阵营中的{g|Encyclopedia:Reputation}声望{/g}。不过，货舱中所有出售的货物都会永远消失。

languages.text:
貨物は強力なローグトレーダーにとって価値が十分ではない戦利品を保管するものである。
戦利品を戦利品画面からドラッグすると取り除ける。それらは適切な貨物のスペースに格納される。戦利品はいつでも貨物から取り出すことができる。
戦利品満載の貨物を商人に売却することで彼らの勢力内でのキャラクターの{g|Encyclopedia:Reputation}評価{/g}が上がる。しかし、その貨物内の全ての戦利品は失われる。

languages.text:
La carga se utiliza para almacenar botín que carece de valor para un Comerciante Independiente.
Arrastra el botín para quitarlo de tu pantalla de botín. Se guardará en un espacio de carga apropiado. Puedes retirar el botín de ella en cualquier momento.
Vender la carga al completo a un mercader mejora tu {g|Encyclopedia:Reputation}reputación{/g} con su facción. Pero, lógicamente, perderás todo el botín que contenga al hacerlo.
languages.original_text:
Cargo is for storing loot that is not valuable enough for a mighty Rogue Trader.
Drag pieces of loot to remove it from your loot screen. It will be packed into a suitable cargo space. You may withdraw loot from cargo at any time.
Selling full cargo to merchants improves your {g|Encyclopedia:Reputation}reputation{/g} with their faction. However, all loot inside that cargo will be lost.

traits.locale_text:
La carga se utiliza para almacenar botín que carece de valor para un Comerciante Independiente.
Arrastra el botín para quitarlo de tu pantalla de botín. Se guardará en un espacio de carga apropiado. Puedes retirar el botín de ella en cualquier momento.
Vender la carga al completo a un mercader mejora tu {g|Encyclopedia:Reputation}reputación{/g} con su facción. Pero, lógicamente, perderás todo el botín que contenga al hacerlo.

languages.text:
Fracht dient der Aufbewahrung von Beute, die für {mf|einen mächtigen Freihändler|eine mächtige Freihändlerin} nicht wertvoll genug ist.
Ziehe Beutestücke, um sie aus deinem Beutebildschirm zu entfernen. Sie werden dann in einen geeigneten Frachtraum geladen. Du kannst jederzeit Beute aus der Fracht nehmen.
Wenn du volle Frachträume an Händler verkaufst, verbessert sich dein {g|Encyclopedia:Reputation}Ruf{/g} bei ihrer Gruppierung. Allerdings ist dann die gesamte Beute in der Fracht verloren.
languages.original_text:
Cargo is for storing loot that is not valuable enough for a mighty Rogue Trader.
Drag pieces of loot to remove it from your loot screen. It will be packed into a suitable cargo space. You may withdraw loot from cargo at any time.
Selling full cargo to merchants improves your {g|Encyclopedia:Reputation}reputation{/g} with their faction. However, all loot inside that cargo will be lost.

traits.locale_text:
In der Fracht kannst du Beute aufbewahren, die nicht wertvoll genug für einen mächtigen Freihändler ist.
Ziehe Beutestücke, um sie aus deinem Beutebildschirm zu entfernen. Sie werden dann in einen geeigneten Frachtraum geladen. Du kannst jederzeit Beute aus der Fracht nehmen.
Wenn du volle Frachträume an Händler verkaufst, verbessert sich dein {g|Encyclopedia:Reputation}Ruf{/g} bei ihrer Fraktion. Allerdings ist dann die gesamte Beute in der Fracht verloren.

languages.text:
La cargaison permet d'entreposer le butin qui n'a pas suffisamment de valeur aux yeux d'un puissant libre-marchand.
Faites glisser des éléments pour les retirer de votre écran Butin. Ceux-ci sont placés dans un espace dédié. Vous pouvez les en retirer à tout moment.
La vente d'une cargaison complète à des marchands améliore votre {g|Encyclopedia:Reputation}réputation{/g} auprès de leur faction. En revanche, tout le butin contenu dans cette cargaison est perdu.
languages.original_text:
Cargo is for storing loot that is not valuable enough for a mighty Rogue Trader.
Drag pieces of loot to remove it from your loot screen. It will be packed into a suitable cargo space. You may withdraw loot from cargo at any time.
Selling full cargo to merchants improves your {g|Encyclopedia:Reputation}reputation{/g} with their faction. However, all loot inside that cargo will be lost.

traits.locale_text:
Le chargement sert à stocker les butins qui n'ont pas suffisamment de valeur pour un puissant Libre-Marchand.
Faites glisser des éléments pour les retirer de votre écran Butin. Ceux-ci sont placés dans un espace de chargement dédié. Vous pouvez retirer le butin du chargement à tout moment.
La vente d'un chargement complet à des marchands améliore votre {g|Encyclopedia:Reputation}réputation{/g} auprès de leur faction. En revanche, tout le butin contenu dans ce chargement est perdu.

languages.text:
Kudretli bir Hür Tacir için yeterince kıymet arz etmeyen ganimetler kargoda depolanır.
Ganimet parçalarını sürükleyerek ganimet ekranından kaldır. Bu parçalar, uygun bir kargo grubuna eklenecektir. Ganimetleri istediğin zaman kargodan geri alabilirsin.
Oluşturduğun tam kargo gruplarını tüccarlara satmak, o fraksiyondaki {g|Encyclopedia:Reputation}itibarını{/g} artırır. Ancak böyle bir durumda o kargo içindeki tüm ganimetler kaybolur.

Drag pieces of loot to remove it from your loot screen. It will be packed into a suitable cargo space. You may withdraw loot from cargo at any time.
Selling full cargo to merchants improves your {g|Encyclopedia:Reputation}reputation{/g} with their faction. However, all loot inside that cargo will be lost.
